casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Derald HAFNER 347P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 5, 2018 Derald Dean Hafner, for Hafner, Derald. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th of October 2018 by Defendant for Petition for Writ of Error Coram Vobis:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of December 2018."
